Reviews.Title: Totally worth it
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I had an original iPad but while here in the US I decided to upgrade (mostly because stuff there is cheaper).  I can confirm that the unlocked iPad *is* unlocked to work in both US and UK (making sure you use the correct microSIM for the country you're in).As for the iPad - well, the iPad is an amazing bit of kit.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Michael Whitehurst
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad.  The first was a Verizon.  It was a good product and great service while used in the U.S.  However, it is not possible to use the 3G portion of this in the overseas countries I go to.  So, I bought the non-Verizon factory unlocked version to use overseas.  It works just fine.Regards
